content: शृंगारिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Amorous, impassioned, enamoured, {@--2@} Relating to love. {@--3@} Stained with red-lead. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} {@--1@} An impassioned lover. {@--2@} A ruby. {@--3@} An elephant. {@--4@} Dress, decoration. {@--5@} The betel-nut tree. {@--6@} A preparation of betel-leaves and pieces of areca-nut, see तांबूल.
